short_summary: Replace 402/406 structure in Richibucto Small Craft Harbour
description: This document is for information purposes only. A replacement of an existing 402/406 structure
full_summary:
==================

### Wharf Reconstruction - Structure 410 (Phase 2)

#### Tenders Details

* Reference Number: WS4147832814-Doc4147861773
* Publication Date: August 15, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 29, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Daylight Time)

#### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Construction Services (CNST)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Delivery: New Brunswick
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End-User Entity: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

#### Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites expressions of interest for the Wharf Reconstruction - Structure 410 (Phase 2) project. The project involves the replacement of existing structure 402/406 in the Richibucto Small Craft Harbour located in Richibucto, New Brunswick. This procurement will be set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).

To be considered, a supplier must certify that it qualifies as an Indigenous business as defined under PSIB and that it will comply with all requirements of PSIB.

#### Contact Information

For inquiries, please contact Adam Beaumaster at adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Additional Information

Please visit the [Ariba Discovery Website] (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17170824?extsite=MTcxNzA4MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for more information.
